title: people complaining about getting one shot
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lQPUcVlPlv0

build: Infinity Edge, Duskblade, Yoomuus, Rapidfire Canon, Socs shoes, Edge of Night, (elixer of wrath)
Runes: Dark Harvest, taste of blood, eyeball collection, relentless hunter, absolute focus, gathering storm

replies.body:
Out of any champion I thought would one shot vayne..... Thresh was the lowest expectation...
I was very wrong.

Actually, he is one of the only champions that can truly 1 shot some one due to his E passive, which deals up to 200% AD + Total Souls BONUS damage. So in essence his first Attack (If its a critical strike, which it was) dealt:

450% AD + #Souls +150(DB) +140(RfC).

Tbh top of the list from the perspective of "real" supports. He's still got that bonus AA damage on his E.

Braum is the one that would surprise me the most.

> [{quoted}](name=Mogarl,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YQRtppgp,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-08-26T01:57:04.102+0000)
>
> Tbh top of the list from the perspective of "real" supports. He's still got that bonus AA damage on his E.
> 
> Braum is the one that would surprise me the most.

That or Janna.
Or a soraka
I hate vayne so I watched that over and over again.
Agree. If that happened to every Vayne player the world would be a much better place.
i like how he runs away from the other 2, cause clearly he has no chance vs anything thats not the bitch class of riot. also known as adcs.

> [{quoted}](name=Jennifer420,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YQRtppgp,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2019-08-26T09:05:57.463+0000)
>
> i like how he runs away from the other 2, cause clearly he has no chance vs anything thats not the bitch class of riot. also known as adcs.

1) he was using the “bitch class”’s items.

2) his damage takes a while of not attacking to recharge, and there are potentially 2 more enemies on the way. Not to mention that build is a burst centric one instead of one that might have lifesteal or combat sustain.
tl:dr he can 1shot adcs. but nothing else
tl:dr he has a cooldown on his one shot and doesn’t have built in free 1v5 mechanics like Vayne.

o trust me I was destroying the mid lane katarina too. It's an anti squishy build, if you ever wonder what assassins are all about, they're all about trying not to touch tanks and hitting the squishy babies

> [{quoted}](name=Jennifer420,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YQRtppgp,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2019-08-26T09:05:57.463+0000)
>
> i like how he runs away from the other 2, cause clearly he has no chance vs anything thats not the bitch class of riot. also known as adcs.

Or maybe Vayne was simply the person that was the most behind on the enemy team so she was the best target? But no, it's clearly because ADCs are sooooo weak, right?

idk if its just me, but adcs being 50/0 or 0/10 really doesnt matter. they have the least hp and armor/mr.
so yeah they are weak. they are literally supposed to be glass canons.

I was expecting some kind of helpful guide/rant on how damage is fine.
Well played, sir.
Please, show us your build and runes!
Dark Harvest and Crits is my best guess
LMAO
Thresh's Flay (E) passive does a ton of damage when fully charged and with the right items. That alone takes a huge chunk of health. You just have to NOT attach for a little while.

> [{quoted}](name=SammyDayspring,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YQRtppgp,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-08-26T03:16:41.578+0000)
>
> Thresh's Flay (E) passive does a ton of damage when fully charged and with the right items. That alone takes a huge chunk of health. You just have to NOT attach for a little while.

People out here acting like this means Vayne is weak and easy to beat, but they could go try this in game 100 times and lose lane 98 of those times.
Is It Possible to Learn This Power?
From now on, I'm gonna link this thread whenever anyone complains about Vayne not having any/enough counterplay.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YQRtppgp,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-08-26T02:00:11.518+0000)
>
> From now on, I'm gonna link this thread whenever anyone complains about Vayne not having any/enough counterplay.

“Just get uber fed and one shot her with the itemization she was planning to build and one shot you with” 5head

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YQRtppgp,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-08-26T02:00:11.518+0000)
>
> From now on, I'm gonna link this thread whenever anyone complains about Vayne not having any/enough counterplay.

... How was that counterplay? Being full build and two levels up as ADC thresh isn't "counterplay"

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YQRtppgp,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-08-26T02:00:11.518+0000)
>
> From now on, I'm gonna link this thread whenever anyone complains about Vayne not having any/enough counterplay.

Whaat? You mean to tell me that an insanely fed champion that has an auto attack enhancer and is also building full damage and lethality one shot a squishy Vayne that's behind? SHE MUST BE TOO WEAK!!!!1!

Don't complain about gettint 1 shot unless ur building armor and health.

Thornmail Ashe wouldn't have gotten 1shot
What is this thresh's build I need to know
lmfao oh... my... damage lol. And yet they say adcs are sooo powerful. dies in 1 hit lol
Which is funny because Thresh used an ADC build to accomplish that.

> [{quoted}](name=Pierce The Veal,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YQRtppgp,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2019-08-26T09:15:33.994+0000)
>
> Which is funny because Thresh used an ADC build to accomplish that.

yeah but the funny thing is when people say adcs are too powerful, they don't mean the build, they mean the champ marksman themselves are too powerful. But i don't think this is true. A rengar with adc build will 1 shot and hit just as hard as an adc. Similar to a nidalee or syndra building adc. But people always think the problem is the marksman themselves even though I personally feel like marksmen are actually pretty weak because of their lower base health, lower base per level, lower base movespeed, lower damage, and lack of 1 or more of the following. hard cc, dash, stealth, burst damage on abilities. They always lack something and only few adcs have some of some things because marksmen class are supposed to use autos as their main source of damage. Meanwhile, champs like yi can build adc, hit hard with their abilties, but also with their auto attacks. The only downside is they don't have ranged autos, but ranged autos isnt even as powerful as it was back in season 1 and 2. Nowadays so many champs have dashes and hard cc that your ranged auto attack isn't justified to make your base health, health per level, base ad, base movespeed, lack of burst in abilities to be low. just my opinion. People think marksmen are op but it's actually the items and runes that are too much.
